review: I have streaming through my blu-ray player, but it drops wireless connection often. The Fire Stick is amazing. Easy setup, remote app for mobile devices, smooth streaming, quick movie startup, and does not drop signal. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
author: Helena

review: Easy to follow directions . We had it working in just a few minutes.
author: Kindle Customer

review: This has to be the BEST money we've spent in a long time! We were able to finally watch Netflix, Amazon Prime, as well as our movie channel subscriptions. Great little gadget that we will use for a long time!
author: Kristine A

review: Bought this with an Amazon Prime offer. Works seamlessly with our Samsung Smart TV. Simple installation once our wifi network was recognized and the password entered. Good product.
author: Phil Purdin "MacMan"

review: So easy to work with. Sorry I didn't get the voice remote. Easy to hook up! took only a minute. Came with everything you need to hook it up with. Easy to buy, easy to use.
